function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for increased occupant exposure to contagious diseases due to retrofitting and increased maintenance activities.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and illness among occupants.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, increase ventilation, and educate occupants on disease prevention.","Technologies":"Improved ventilation systems, air purifiers, and touchless technology for controls.","People":"Occupants, maintenance staff, and visitors.","Owner":"Building management, maintenance staff."},{"Description":"Inadequate control patterns for domestic hot water systems may lead to the proliferation of Legionella bacteria.","Impact":"Risk of Legionnaires' disease and other waterborne illnesses.","Mitigation":"Implement regular disinfection protocols, maintain proper water temperature, and monitor water quality.","Technologies":"Temperature sensors, automatic flush systems, and water quality monitoring devices.","People":"Occupants, maintenance staff, and visitors.","Owner":"Building management, maintenance staff."}]}
